verses.verse: Dare <S%G5111><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you, having <S%G2192><s%> a matter <S%G4229><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> go to law <S%G2919><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the unjust, <S%G94><s%> and not before <S%G1909><s%> the saints? <S%G40><s%>

Do you not know <S%G1492><s%> that the saints <S%G40><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> the world? <S%G2889><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> shall be judged <S%G2919><s%> by you, are you unworthy <S%G370><s%> to judge <S%G2922><s%> the smallest <S%G1646><s%> matters?
Know <S%G1492><s%> you not that we shall judge <S%G2919><s%> angels? <S%G32><s%> how <S%G3386><s%> much <S%G3386><s%> more <S%G1065><s%> things that pertain to this life? <S%G982><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> judgments <S%G2922><s%> of things pertaining to this life, <S%G982><s%> set <S%G2523><s%> them to judge who are least <S%G1848><s%> esteemed <S%G1848><s%> in the church. <S%G1577><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> to your <S%G5213><s%> shame. <S%G1791><s%> Is it so, <S%G3779><s%> that there is not a wise <S%G4680><s%> man among <S%G1722><s%> you? no, not one that shall be able <S%G1410><s%> to judge <S%G1252><s%> between <S%G303><s%> <S%G3319><s%> his brothers? <S%G80><s%>
But brother <S%G80><s%> goes to law <S%G2919><s%> with brother, <S%G80><s%> and that before <S%G1909><s%> the unbelievers. <S%G571><s%>

Now <S%G2236><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> there is utterly <S%G3654><s%> a fault <S%G2275><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, because <S%G3754><s%> you go to law <S%G2917><s%> one <S%G1438><s%> with another. <S%G1438><s%> Why <S%G1302><s%> do you not rather <S%G3123><s%> take wrong? <S%G91><s%> why <S%G1302><s%> do you not rather <S%G3123><s%> suffer yourselves to be defrauded? <S%G650><s%>
No, <S%G235><s%> you do wrong, <S%G91><s%> and defraud, <S%G650><s%> and that your brothers. <S%G80><s%>

Know <S%G1492><s%> you not that the unrighteous <S%G94><s%> shall not inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> Be not deceived: <S%G4105><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> fornicators, <S%G4205><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> idolaters, <S%G1496><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> adulterers, <S%G3432><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> effeminate, <S%G3120><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> abusers <S%G733><s%> of themselves with mankind, <S%G733><s%>

Nor <S%G3777><s%> thieves, <S%G2812><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> covetous, <S%G4123><s%> nor <S%G3756><s%> drunkards, <S%G3183><s%> nor <S%G3756><s%> revilers, <S%G3060><s%> nor <S%G3756><s%> extortionists, <S%G727><s%> shall inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And such <S%G5023><s%> were some <S%G5100><s%> of you: but you are washed, <S%G628><s%> but you are sanctified, <S%G37><s%> but you are justified <S%G1344><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of our God. <S%G2316><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> things are lawful <S%G1832><s%> to me, but all <S%G3956><s%> things are not expedient: <S%G4851><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me, but I will not be brought <S%G1850><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the power <S%G1850><s%> of any. <S%G5100><s%>

Meats <S%G1033><s%> for the belly, <S%G2836><s%> and the belly <S%G2836><s%> for meats: <S%G1033><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> shall destroy <S%G2673><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> it and them. Now <S%G1161><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> is not for fornication, <S%G4202><s%> but for the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> for the body. <S%G4983><s%>
And God <S%G2316><s%> has both <S%G2532><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> up the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and will also <S%G2532><s%> raise <S%G1825><s%> up us by his own <S%G848><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>

Know <S%G1492><s%> you not that your <S%G5216><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> are the members <S%G3196><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%> shall I then <S%G3767><s%> take <S%G142><s%> the members <S%G3196><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and make <S%G4160><s%> them the members <S%G3196><s%> of an harlot? <S%G4204><s%> God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%>

What? <S%G2228><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> you not that he which is joined <S%G2853><s%> to an harlot <S%G4204><s%> is one <S%G1520><s%> body? <S%G4983><s%> for two, <S%G1417><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> he, shall be one <S%G3391><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
But he that is joined <S%G2853><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is one <S%G1520><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Flee <S%G5343><s%> fornication. <S%G4202><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> sin <S%G265><s%> that a man <S%G444><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> is without <S%G1622><s%> the body; <S%G4983><s%> but he that commits <S%G4203><s%> fornication <S%G4203><s%> sins <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

What? <S%G2228><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> you not that your <S%G1438><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> is the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is in you, which you have <S%G2192><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and you are not your <S%G5216><s%> own? <S%G1438><s%>

For you are bought <S%G59><s%> with a price: <S%G5092><s%> therefore <S%G1211><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> and in your <S%G5216><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> are God's. <S%G2316><s%>
